title: Alpine Skiing Basics
description: Test your knowledge about alpine skiing techniques, safety, and equipment.

questions.question: Wearing a helmet significantly reduces the risk of head injuries while skiing.
What is the primary purpose of ski edges?

options.text: To increase speed on flat terrain
To help control direction and grip on snow
To reduce fatigue in the legs

questions.question: Which slope color usually indicates the most difficult runs in Europe?
You should always give way to skiers downhill from you.
What does the term 'carving' mean in skiing?

options.text: Making turns using the ski edges with minimal skidding

questions.question: Which piece of equipment connects your boots to the skis?
Leaning too far back is a correct skiing posture on steep slopes.
What should you do if you fall on a busy ski slope?

options.text: Stay where you are and rest
Get up quickly or move to the side of the slope
Wave your ski poles in the air
